description:
A baker by trade and a former apprentice to Dumas. He is a friend of Roya and Zed. He is given Dumas` Spirit after Dumas was killed and had serious difficulty controlling it. He seems to be romantically interested in Pino, a maid of Rob√®s. 
Mikki seems to be a childhood friend of Roya. Mikki makes his first appearance in episode 2, in which he elaborates on his will to live up to the expectations of his sensei, Dumas. Mikki works hard every day within a field-like area, accomplishing simple tasks with Dumas. After Dumas was forced to be rid of his house, Mikki takes him to live in his family`s abandoned house with Zed and Roya.
name: Mikki
